column2: "So you couldn't save her either."
"I figured this would happen. Because I..."
"I am you. I am another you, who also failed to save her."
"No matter what changes to history I made, she always ended up becoming the [Profound Darkness]."
"Every single time, without fail."
"Do you understand now? All we can do to save her is kill her. That's the only way she can still be saved."
"Come with me. Let's give her a peaceful end; I and me, together."
"１．Agree"
"２．Refuse"
"You would still torment her? I'm telling you the only way we can prevent her suffering is to kill her."
"You have no idea how impossible it is to save her, but I do. I've seen every outcome."
"Ten years ago up to today; it doesn't matter what you do. She always ends up becoming the [Profound Darkness]."
"Everything will be destroyed. Destroyed by her, who wants nothing more than the opposite: to protect everyone."
"Is that what you want for her? You, who knows what she wants more than anyone?"
"That is why I must kill her. I will not let her suffer that fate. I have to kill her."
"１．It's too early to give up."
"２．...Alright."
"That's exactly the sort of stubbornness that's caused her so much damned suffering!"
"I'm done here. It seems you're blind to reason."
"You mean to stop me? ...I should have killed you during our first meeting."
"... I am Dark Falz [Persona]. My sole aim is to erase the [Profound Darkness]."
"I will kill her, and I will destroy anything and anyone that tries to stop me."
